Package translator

Class Translator

java.lang.Object
translator.Translator
All Implemented Interfaces:
translator.ITranslator
public class Translator extends Object implements translator.ITranslator
The translator class handles processing the information passed from the user interface and translating the sentence to pass back to the user interface. Also reads the corpus file to know what language to translate from and to
Author:
jackrutherford

    void
    consultLookup()

    Goes through the corpus file using a buffered reader and puts the english and french words into a 2D array to access when we translate a sentene later

    Translates the original sentence, and deals with checking capitalization of the first letter

  • Method Details

    • readCorpus

      public void readCorpus() throws FileNotFoundException
      Goes through the corpus file using a buffered reader and puts the english and french words into a 2D array to access when we translate a sentene later
